      This class realizes a referee for the game, whose main function is to request moves from both players in turn.

      HumanPlayer(Requestable request, Requestable gui)
      Constructor that takes two Requestables, the first one being the one to forward our {link #requestMove} calls to, the second one should has to be an implementation with graphical output
